history.proof: intros. hauto depth: 6 lq: on use: @iter_nat_Chasles unfold: zero, plus, sum_n_m, AbelianGroup.sort, AbelianGroup.plus, AbelianGroup.zero inv: AbelianGroup.mixin_of.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. unfold sum_n_m. unfold iter_nat. induction H. - intros. simpl. apply plus_zero_r. - intros. simpl. rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite (plus_comm (a m)). rewrite <- plus_assoc. rewrite IHle. reflexivity.
